  • Method Details

    • hasResult

      public boolean hasResult()
      Description copied from interface: Client
      Whether or not a Result was received for the previously sent Command. Should return immediately without blocking, sleeping, or starting other threads.
      Specified by:
      hasResult in interface Client
      Returns:
      whether the Result has been received

    • getResult

      public Result getResult() throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Description copied from interface: Client

      Returns the value from the Result for the previously sent Command. Should block until there is such a Result or the waiting thread is interrupted; this of course means that this method should relinquish all locks/monitors it holds preventing messages from being received while it is waiting. If the calling thread is interrupted while waiting for a Result, an InterruptedException should be thrown. Successive calls to this method (and Client.hasResult()) that are not interrupted and are not interleaved with calls to Client.sendCommand(Command) should continue to return the same value.

      Specified by:
      getResult in interface Client
      Returns:
      the value corresponding to the previously sent Command
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - when the calling thread is interrupted while blocking

    • recvResult

      protected void recvResult​(Result res, Address sender)
